question_sentence: Scientists may have found the longest dinosaur in the world. What is it called?
Which of these cryptocurrencies does Elon Musk not own?
Which former New York Jets coach said he takes it “personal” when he’s compared to current coach Robert Saleh?
Which movie franchise turned 20 earlier this week?
The Wyoming GOP voted to do what to Rep. Liz Cheney?
choices: No longer recognize her as a Republican

question_sentence: President Joe Biden called for federal regulators to investigate the rising prices of:
The House of Representatives censured Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona for posting an animated video that:
choices: Depicts him killing Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez
Depicts him attacking President Joe Biden
Uses the theme song of “Attack on Titan”

question_sentence: Which celebrity couple announced their breakup this week?
choices: Megan Fox and Machine Gun Kelly

question_sentence: In an effort to distance itself from founder John Schnatter, Papa John’s has changed its name to:
A recently published paper found that the lingcod fish has around 500 teeth. What does it eat?
What is the name of the film Alec Baldwin was filming when he fatally shot cinematographer Halyna Hutchins?
evidence: The actor is facing a lawsuit filed a member of crew who alledges that he played ‘Russian roulette’ when he failed to check that the weapon was not loaded

question_sentence: Heavy rainfall triggered landslides and flooded highways cutting off which Canadian city?
evidence: A state of emergency was declared after storms dumped one month of rain in 24 hours over the Pacific north-west

question_sentence: Which former cricket player appeared in front of a House of Commons select committee to describe the racism he faced at Yorkshire County Cricket Club?
evidence: The former Yorkshire player later apologised over historical anti-Semitic messages

question_sentence: The first lockdown of unvaccinated people was introduced in which European country?
evidence: The country has since announced a full lockdown amid rapidly increasing infection rates

question_sentence: Which Conservative MP made headlines after objecting to Boris Johnson’s attempt to draw a line under the Owen Paterson sleaze scandal?
evidence: The backbencher has a track record of unpopular objections and previously filibustered a bill to make upskirting illegal

question_sentence: Archipelago, an online group of activists, has threatened to organise a day of protests in which country?
evidence: Authorities moved to arrest the young pro-democracy activists in the run up to planned demonstrations

question_sentence: The men jailed for the murder of which civil rights activist had their convictions quashed?
evidence: Muhammad A Aziz and Khalil Islam, spent more than 20 years in prison for the killing of the civil rights activist in 1996

question_sentence: A pensioner was given a restraining order after repeatedly feeding what animal against the wishes of its owner?
evidence: The retired racehorse in Yorkshire was regularly visited by Margaret Porter who felt the horse was ‘looking quite sad’

question_sentence: Which country enacted legislation banning employers from contacting workers outside of their contracted hours?
evidence: The ‘right to rest’ rules  were introduced by Portugal’s Socialist-led government to help improve the nation’s work-life balance

question_sentence: US Vice President Kamala Harris visited which European ally amid rumours of a split with Joe Biden?
evidence: The White House has been forced to deny rumours that the president is deliberately sidelining his right-hand woman

question_sentence: The White House tapped Mitch Landrieu to lead the implementation of the roughly $1 trillion infrastructure bill. Where did Landrieu formerly serve as mayor?
evidence: Landrieu served as the mayor of New Orleans, Louisiana from 2010 to 2018 and was also Lieutenant Governor there during Hurricane Katrina in 2005.

question_sentence: Health and Human Services has announced the end of a policy that limited the FDA’s review of what specific product, even when said product was shown to be flawed?
evidence: The former policy specifically limited the review of laboratory-developed tests including ones for Covid-19. The withdrawal is intended to make sure “COVID-19 tests are accurate, reliable, and available,” according to an HHS statement.

question_sentence: Which world leader did US President Joe Biden meet with this week in a virtual summit?
evidence: President Biden held a high-stakes virtual meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping. The two talked about how to keep competition between their nations from turning into conflict, and Biden raised concerns about trade issues and human rights abuses in China.

question_sentence: Which African capital city was rocked by a series of coordinated suicide bombing attacks that were later claimed by the Islamic State?
evidence: The attacks – which ISIS has since claimed responsibility for – occurred in the capital city of Kampala, Uganda, injuring dozens and killing at least one police officer and two civilians.

question_sentence: According to US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen, in what month is the US estimated to hit its debt limit?
evidence: Yellen estimates that the US could reach the debt limit on December 15 if the debt ceiling isn’t raised by that point, an essential action currently stymied by political divisions in Congress.

question_sentence: The cast of this beloved franchise is planning to reunite for a retrospective special in honor of a big anniversary.
evidence: The cast of the “Harry Potter”movies is coming together on January 1 for a special on HBO Max called “Harry Potter 20th Anniversary: Return to Hogwarts.”

question_sentence: House Democrats and two Republicans voted for a resolution to censure one of its members for the first time since 2010. What’s at the heart of the controversy?
choices: a false claim about the January 6 Capitol attack
a verbal outburst on the House floor
a video posted to social media
evidence: All Democratic members of Congress, joined by two Republicans, voted for a resolution that censured Republican Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona after he posted a video of him as an anime character appearing to kill Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and attack President Joe Biden.

question_sentence: Which industry has President Joe Biden asked the Federal Trade Commission to investigate, citing “mounting evidence of anti-consumer behavior,”?
evidence: With prices soaring at the pump, Biden asked the FTC to look into illegal activities in the oil and gas industry. Industry reps have called the possible investigation a “distraction.”

question_sentence: Applebee’s is bringing a new flavor of wings to its menu for a limited time. What dish is the inspiration for the culinary creation?
evidence: In an effort to draw in younger customers, Applebee’s will be temporarily offering the Cosmic Wings menu which features wings tossed in original or Flamin’ Hot Cheetos sauces and coated in Cheetos crumble.

question_sentence: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio said this cherished New York City tradition is back with “big, strong, full strength,” — and people can participate only as long as they are vaccinated against Covid-19.
choices: the Times Square NYE ball drop
evidence: In attempting to convey to the world that New York is “100% back,” de Blasio announced that in-person spectators can attend the Time’s Square New Year’s Eve ball drop celebration so long as they’re vaccinated.
